column2: SAP Solution Architect QM/PPThe SAP program is a multi-year program (2015 -202X) to build and deploy a one global SAP solution for the Business Sector      An important element in the success of the program will be the newly created ERP Project/CR implementation team function      This function has a key role in the ERP support structure establishing ongoing sustain and optimize operations as well as ensuring a Customer First focus      Solution Architect is responsible to implement the technical delivery of project gaps and change request      They will be the core team of project delivery of Electronics and support the team to delivery the best in class solutions into Electronics ERP        Main responsibilities:        Detailed knowledge of Application area to understand integrated processes across modules and Provide the technical solutions and ensures that technical solution is meeting the business requirements for Change request and follow up Quattro implementation and development guideline      Advises on technology changes and enhancements bringing to the attention of the Process and Business OwnersPartners with the Business Process Owner Organisation, BPA, COE to translate URS proposals into BTS (concept and implementation)Work with other applications to deliver E2E solution and technical alignment      Support technical Cut-over and Go-live activities according to project planDefines and conducts quality checks (technical documentation, Quality, Assessment, Prototyping, Deployment, Go-live and lessons learnt)Make sure Security control; High motivate self-learning and self-development      Willing to team-work      Suggest improvement on technical      Monthly status review; and objective setting and performance review with COE team      Knowledge, Skills and Experience:Bachelors Degree or Bachelor of Science ComputerExcellent project management and communication skills are expected      Analytical skills, strong perseverance, a high degree of initiative and independence with the ability to work with people from various backgrounds/cultures couple with strong customer and partner interface      Minimum 3 to 7 years experience within PP/QM Module including PP-PI (Process Industrial Solution)      Experience with system design, configuration, customization, integration, testing and supportGood knowledge of Interface technical(BAPI, User exists, ABAP code, RFC connection, Web services etc)      Expert in cross-functional integration of different modules and interfacing applications including MES/QMIS(Manufacturing Execution System) etc      Excellent interpersonal communication skills consisting of excellent writing and speaking skills      Highly skillful to work in diverse environment at individual level as well as team      Ability to proactively identify upcoming risks, issues, and bottlenecks and resolve issues that sometimes cross departmental boundariesAbility to work in a multi-cultural environment and remote team      Preferred Skills: Reading and good understanding of ABAP code, especially on interface knowledge and performance tuning      Experience with OSS, SAP Upgrades, and Project Implementations are all requiredAbility to collaborate effectively across all levels of the organization and with different organizational entitiesExperience with large Full Life Cycle (FLC) project implementations We are an equal opportunity employer that values workforce diversity

column2: As an Aras PLM Solution Architect, you will be leading successful customer deployments of Aras innovator solutions. You will lead the technical implementation team during the planning, elaboration, design, construction, and transition of solutions to the customer. You will be accountable for overall technical software solution delivered. Demonstration of technical leadership, large team management, organization skills, and the ability to negotiate with key customer stakeholders are essential in ensuring success.       Key Responsibilities:         Should be single point of contact for a project involving ARAS PLM platform on technical inputs         Facilitate workshops, develop solutions, build consensus across all stakeholders to ensure timely and successful delivery of technology aligned to business value         Work closely and collaboratively with stakeholders to understand and capture requirements and to devise effective technical solutions.         Develop conceptual solution architecture using combination of standard and custom applications to produce end-to-end customer solution         Lead as well as support the development of requirements specifications, Use Cases, and functional specifications         Perform solution analysis and develop customer facing proposals and contribute to the development of proposals / statements of work         Transform customer requirements to technical solutions through a thorough understanding of the Aras Innovator suite of tools         Lead or participate in the delivery of Proof-of-Concept engagements at key prospects         Provide input to the development team regarding methodology and tools         Provide coaching and mentoring to other team members as necessary         Assign tasks to project members and reviews the team s work products to ensure that they are accurate and consistent. Supervises and manages project teams as appropriate.         Supervise and manage technical teams that may be located either onsite or offshore         Should be technology agnostic and understand the emerging technologies and applicability around Aras Innovator platform.         Should be up to date on Aras Innovator solutions and be proactive in understanding customer s business and suggest them timely on the usage.         Should be able to act as subject matter expert for the domain, processes, methodology and able to adapt latest technologies, frameworks and tools quickly.         Lead and Support in activities such as technical discovery, demos, proof of value, POC, presentation, sizing, and documentation of technical decision criteria         Drive the development team to use latest and better technologies.         Create and ensure best-practices, standards, and documentation among development teams.         Bring in Continuous Improvement using DevOps solutions.         Lead and Participate in ongoing training programs and conduct trainings as needed.         Skills:         Hands-on experience with Aras PLM Innovator performing configuration and customisation, integrations at the enterprise level is strongly desired.         Should be well versed with Aras Platform architecture and its majority of modules.         Must be able to write clear, understandable Requirements, SOW, Specification documents, and Use Cases.         Have a thorough understanding of large-scale enterprise application deployment methodologies with experience leading teams in an Agile / Scrum environment         Excellent communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills, fluent in English and should be able to handle discussions with stakeholders independently.         Ability to work in teams, global environment, and manage multiple priorities and deliverables concurrently.         Highly organized and self-motivated with the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and manage changing priorities         Strong rapport and relationship building skills with both internal individuals and external customers. Must be an effective communicator in difficult customer situations         Proven strong project management skills with accountability for end-to-end delivery         Strong planning, problem solving, and decision-making skills         Technically self-sufficient with data modelling techniques, SQL Server and Microsoft Office products. Installation and configuration of SQL Server, SQL Scripting (Transact SQL), SQL triggers, stored procedures, functions, etc.         Must be proficient with web programming languages such as: C# (.NET), Javascript, HTML, XML, XSL         Good experience with Web API Services: REST and SOAP         Experience in best practices and tools around CI/CD         Exposure to cloud Azure/AWS         Experience with data migration techniques from legacy systems.         Experience/Education:         Bachelor s or Master s degree in Engineering or Computer Science (or equivalent experience)         Minimum of 10 years of PLM implementation experience         Proven track record in leading large, enterprise PLM software deployments in an Architect role         Demonstrated experience with Agile project management tools such as Jira         Experience in any of the following verticals: Manufacturing, Automotive, Semi-conductors, Consumer Products, High Tech Electronics, Aerospace         Industry knowledge of any of the following: Engineering Change processes, CMII change management, Phase Gate Project Management, Quality systems processes, Manufacturing Process Planning

column1: S&C Global Network - AI - FS Data & AI Strategy - Sr Manager
column2: Entity :- Accenture Strategy & Consulting Team :- Global Network Data & AI Practice :- Financial Services Engineering Title :Ind & Func AI Value Strategy Sr Manager Job location :- Bangalore/Gurgaon/Hyderabad/Mumbai/Pune About S&C - Global Network :- Accenture Global Network - Data & AI practice help our clients grow their business in entirely new ways. Analytics enables our clients to achieve high performance through insights from data - insights that inform better decisions and strengthen customer relationships. From strategy to execution, Accenture works with organizations to develop analytic capabilities - from accessing and reporting on data to predictive modelling - to outperform the competition. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? FS Engineering team, work on cutting edge technology landscape. We lead and help the customers through their transformation journey in adoption of cloud, AI, and Generative AI based solutions. You will be exposed to innovative use cases of applied intelligence and latest technology stack that you will be expected to drive including Gen AI and other advanced emerging areas of work. Provide opportunity of to interact and set agenda before the customer to drive change. You will be part of a diverse, vibrant, global Accenture community, continually pushing the boundaries of business and technology capabilities. What you would do in this role Interact with the customer and build their data and AI strategy. Define the solution design and data architecture for these industry solutions. Identify opportunities where AI can be leveraged to create competitive advantage and solve complex challenges to deliver exceptional business outcome. Use functional and domain expertise to design and implement AI based decision-making frameworks and models to drive insights for decision making to solve business challenges. Provide consulting service to customers to review their environment, provide the architecture options, operating model blueprints, business case and roadmaps for their landscape. Manage teams and deliver the projects independently in the customer engagement. Provide the consulting leadership and support practice initiatives to help further the practice capabilities. Qualification Who are we looking for? Years of Experience : 12+ years Education : BTech, MTech or MBA Add eligibility : Energy and Utilities/Banking and Insurance  Industry domain knowledge. Add about desired experience : 14 Tools & Techniques :  Data Strategy, Data Architecture and Solution design Knowledge Strong Industry and functional consultation experience. Expertise in providing proposals and business architectures, presentations.  Should have participated in multiple AI based RFP submission. Knowledge of Cloud Azure/AWS/Google Knowledge of Python programming preferred. Strong domain knowledge of Energy and Utilities Industry/Banking and Insurance Industry. Implementation knowledge of GenAI based solutions will be added advantage. Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion, or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic, or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.

Assist in quality management reviews, ensure all business and design requirements are met. Educate stakeholders to ensure a complete understanding of the designs.  Must have skills : Data Analytics, Data Warehouse ETL Testing, Hadoop Administration, Big Data Analysis Tool and Techniques Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Specific undergraduate qualifications ie engineering computer science Summary :Experienced Data Engineer with a strong background in Azure data services and broadcast supply chain ecosystems. Skilled in OTT streaming protocols, cloud technologies, and project management.  Roles & Responsibilities: Proven experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role. Lead and support expert guidance to Principal - Solutions & Integration. Track and report on project progress using internal applications. Transition customer requirements to on-air operations with proper documentation. Scope projects and ensure adherence to budgets and timelines. Generate design and integration documentation.Professional & Technical Skills: Strong proficiency in Azure data services (Azure Data Factory, Azure Databricks, Azure SQL Database). Experience with SQL, Python, and big data tools (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka). Familiarity with data warehousing, ETL techniques, and microservices in a cloud environment. Knowledge of broadcast supply chain ecosystems (BMS, RMS, MAM, Playout, MCR/PCR, NLE, Traffic). Experience with OTT streaming protocols, DRM, and content delivery networks. Working knowledge of cloud technologies (Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS Basics, GCP Basics). Basic understanding of AWS Media Services (Media Connect, Elemental, MediaLive, Media Store, Media 2 Cloud, S3, Glacier).Additional Information: Minimum of 5 years' experience in Data Analytics disciplines. Good presentation and documentation skills. Excellent interpersonal skills. Undergraduate qualifications in engineering or computer science.Networking:Apply basic networking knowledge including TCP/IP, UDP/IP, IGMP, DHCP, DNS, and LAN/WAN technologies to support video delivery systems.Highly Desirable: Experience in defining technical solutions with over 99.999% reliability. Qualification Specific undergraduate qualifications ie engineering computer science

column2: Project Role : Solution Architect Project Role Description : Translate client requirements into differentiated, deliverable solutions using in-depth knowledge of a technology, function, or platform. Must have skills : Solution Architecture Good to have skills : NA Minimum  15  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Full time education Summary :You will be responsible for owning the overall solution blueprint and roadmap, working closely with clients to articulate business problems and translate them into an appropriate solution design. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, analyzing business requirements, and designing solutions that meet client needs. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, project managers, and business analysts, to analyze business requirements and design solutions that meet client needs. Translate business problems into appropriate solution designs, ensuring that solutions are scalable, reliable, and maintainable. Provide technical leadership and guidance to development teams, ensuring that solutions are designed and implemented in accordance with best practices and industry standards. Stay updated with the latest advancements in solution architecture and planning, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Expertise in solution architecture. Good To Have Skills:Experience with cloud technologies such as AWS or Azure, experience with microservices architecture, experience with DevOps practices. Strong understanding of software development methodologies and best practices. Experience with designing and implementing complex solutions that meet client needs. Experience with providing technical leadership and guidance to development teams. Solid grasp of solution architecture and planning principles, including experience with designing scalable, reliable, and maintainable solutions. Additional Information: This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification Full time education

column2: Project Role : Solution Architect Project Role Description : Own the overall solution blueprint and roadmap, work closely with clients to articulate business problems and translate them into an appropriate solution design. Must have skills : Solution Architecture Good to have skills : NA Minimum  12  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Own the overall solution blueprint and roadmap, work closely with clients to articulate business problems and translate them into an appropriate solution design. Job Title: Technology Solution Architect (System Integration and /or Application Managed Services)Purpose of the Job:The Solution Architect is responsible for supporting the Systems Integration (SI) and Application Managed Services (AMS) sales opportunities within Technology team(s) to ensure that solutions proposed to clients meet the client's needs and expectations, and can also be delivered in a reliable and predictable way within budget. This frequently requires balancing competing priorities, using innovative commercial and technical approaches to minimise risk and to meet challenging business cases. This means that the Solution Architect needs to demonstrate creativity and soft skills in driving consensus and alignment across multiple stakeholders, as well as more traditional technical, project management and commercial skills to arrive at optimum best fit solution response. The Solution Architect needs to act as a single point of contact (SPOC) for the opportunity throughout the sales process. This involves coordinating between Technology, Industry, Bid team, Global Delivery teams, other solution architect(s), subject matter experts (SME's), reviewers and approvers to ensure a winning, differentiated, deliverable and approved solution.Primary Responsibilities Engage with appropriate Accenture organisation areas to fully leverage the right assets and offerings, across capability groups when pursuing opportunities.  Understand and translate buyer values and requirements into the solution approach, leveraging standard processes, methods, deliverables, and the right mix of offerings.  Define a differentiated solution that achieves the greatest value (using Accenture's best practices) for the client and meets the client business case, delivering value, with a high level of confidence about the solution.  Manage the interface with the Technology sales team during the sales process and Delivery by ensuring regular communication and close collaboration with the sales team. Provide input to the sales team on how the solution may influence the sales campaign, pricing, risks and assumptions and negotiation strategy.  Lead/Participate in a team to plan, execute and manage the solution in response to a client requirement/RFP. This involves the coordination of various stakeholders across sales, delivery and CGs. Participate and/or lead solution discussions and client meetings related to technology solution or platform(s) (SAP S/4 or Oracle cloud or Salesforce, etc.) differentiation solution proposed to the client.  Shape the commercial proposition by working with finance team / commercial team or other responsible areas to develop the underlying economics of the solution.  Work with Legal and Commercial teams to ensure use of standards and adherence for internal compliance. Collaborate with the legal advisors to provide input to contractual Terms and Conditions. Manage solution risk assessment through active issue management and risk mitigation.  Contribute to Solution specific content for Response or Proposal material. Support creation of (and review) contract schedules. Obtain the necessary signoff and compliance of the solution with proper input from the Technology and Delivery Leads on client business objectives, industry, risk assessment, budget, and preferences. Lead and/or participate discussions around Client Value Creation, Innovation, Solution Differentiation and provide solution details during orals / client workshop sessions. Confirm artifacts developed during the Solutioning and ensure they are uploaded according to the defined processe(s). Effectively transition the Solution Plan to the appropriate teams within the Delivery Platforms, including Service Delivery and Mobilisation.Skills and Capabilities Ability to build trusted relationships with Client CXOs/SVPs Eco-system partners. Excellent oral and written communication skills. Independence and self-motivation. Ability to coordinate a distributed and diverse team. Attention to detail attitude. Knowledge and experience in financial analysis and costing.  Industry-specific solution knowledge and knowledge (ability to build knowledge) of Accenture offerings, assets and capabilities (recommended).Professional experience and other requirements 10+ years of experience in the Information Technology industry, with minimum experience of technology consulting, technology solutioning, technology sales in application services (system integration, application outsourcing, cloud advisory) experience.  At-least 5 years of extensive selling/pre-sales/solutioning experience in client proximity. column2: Title: Deal Structuring & Pricing - Competitive Pricing Architect Senior Manager Role (Job Profile):Pricing Optimization Senior Manager Management Level:Senior Manager (ML6 )  You Are: A well-connected influencer with their finger on the pulse of the market. A teacher and a learner-you share your knowledge generously while absorbing what others tell you. Your intellectual curiosity and flexibility allow you to manage uncertainty with ease. A skilled communicator and go-to advisor, you inspire confidence in those you lead-and in other leaders. The Work: You apply your expert knowledge of the IT market and its key players to ensure Accenture offers deals that are attractive to customers, and profitable to the business.  You will establish guidance on pricing and competitive positioning to help senior executives decide how to price large and complex deals, by: Analyzing client perception and competition to influence commercial strategies and improve profitability Helping sales teams understand client requirements and selection criteria Working with teams to analyze solutions, develop business cases, and prepare proposals and presentations Advising senior leaders on whether deals are worth pursuing Educating sales teams on market context to give them confidence in our pricing approach Coaching sales teams on negotiation and joining negotiations if needed Identifying, developing, and implementing ways to improve sales practices and processes Preparing and presenting assessments of our pricing strategies and competitive positioning to Accenture leadership Continuously developing self and others Providing insights and thought leadership to inform our commercial offerings

column2: Together with GBS Business lines, you advise our customers with your profound technology solution architecture competencies and agile project management and/or consulting experience.         You are responsible for the overall solution design & architecture from the idea to successful go-live of our customer use cases.         You are running technical deep dive and architecture sessions with customers, partners and our devops teams.         You are actively shaping digital use cases by creating & communicating the technical solution architecture in close collaboration with the cross-functional product & customer teams including software engineers, UX designers and business process experts.         You provide architectural guidance for new solutions and services across different technology domains and ensure their compliance with the existing architectural landscape.         You advise customers on architectural decisions considering our digital solutions such as AWS, ServiceNow, Snowflake, Mendix.         You facilitate stakeholder alignment via close collaboration with management levels in HQ and regions.                     You'd describe yourself as:                  You have a successfully completed university degree in Computer Science or other equivalent disciplines and at least 7+ years of experience.         You have deep technical skills in software architecture and cloud computing.         With your customer facing skills, ideally gained within a partner/consulting organization, you inspire your peers for new technologies and processes.         You have a solid understanding on enterprise and cloud integration patterns, integration platform and technologies.         Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment, often with conflicting or changing priorities         High affinity for market-leading technical solutions (eg AWS, ServiceNow, Mendix)         Experience of design and implementation of market-leading technical solutions         Experience and knowledge in technology domains such as advanced analytics, data science, ML/AI, business process management, RPA and low code platforms is of advantage.         You can multitask in a fast-changing environment and bring high-energy, you have analytical thinking and project management ability (Agile delivery, CI/CD, DevOps, IaC).         Experience with Scrum methodology.         Strong verbal and written communications skills in English are a must.         We are looking for a self-motivated person with a deep understanding of cloud, use cases, architectures, workflow and ecosystem.          The ability to connect technology with measurable business value is critical to a Solution Architect.          You should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, products, and technical challenges.         As a Solution Architect, you will engage with Siemens Global Business Services, its customers and prospects across various business lines.          You will be responsible for partnering with process consultants and data analysts to design digital solutions driving digital transformation of our own operations and those of our customers across different technology domains such as advanced analytics, data science / engineering, business process management, low-code, RPA and AI.

Feature Backlog and Prioritization - Responsible for maintaining feature requests backlog and prioritizing them basis business priority and delivery timelines.      Identify constraints - Highlight any long-term risks that may originate as a consequence of design or architectural choices made in the overall system design leading to an incomplete solution mapping and suggest corrective measures.      Solution Documentation - Translate business requirements basis the strong domain and accounting knowledge into solution documents consisting of technical aspects such as API specs as required. Taking care of integration aspects between various Zeta systems and ensuring that end-to-end flow is kept in mind while designing any solution. Ensure that the specifications are defined unambiguously for the engineering teams to develop and deliver the software.     Implementation - Manage the delivery of solutions while highlighting corner cases where the implementation may be lacking. Be the point of contact for functional queries that would require domain-specific context to help unblock the team. Work with UAT teams to ensure the comprehensiveness and correctness of the delivered solution.      Communicating with internal and external stakeholders - Constant engagement with the required stakeholders is needed on various fronts such as answering queries related to product features, helping in replicating/ troubleshooting issues, aligning on the proposed solution in order to deliver the required feature, and taking things to closure. Deep knowledge of Accounting as applicable to products such as Credit cards, Savings, and Term Deposit accounts. Excellent project management skills with past experience dealing with product managers, engineers, technical program managers, and senior leaders.      Keeps customer needs at the forefront of priorities and takes action to provide high-quality solutions/services that exceed their expectations.     Quickly adapt to multiple changing work demands and priorities by adjusting style and tactics to fit the new circumstances     Must possess customer-facing experience

As a manager, one must provide guidance and direction to ensure the teams efforts align with organizational goals and client needs. Acting as a subject matter expert, they provide strategic advice and practical recommendations to clients, leveraging their deep understanding of industry best practices and emerging trends. Simultaneously, they serve as a mentor and educator within the organization, imparting knowledge and skills to team members through tailored training programs and workshops. The IT Innovation Solution Architect will be responsible for designing and implementing innovative and scalable solutions that leverage emerging technologies to drive digital transformation within our organization. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in solution architecture, a deep understanding of emerging technologies, and a passion for driving innovation and delivering business value.                           Responsibilities:                               Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and identify opportunities for innovation and improvement.                             Design and develop innovative and scalable solutions that leverage emerging technologies, such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, blockchain, or Internet of Things (IoT).                             Define the technical architecture and ensure alignment with business goals, industry best practices, and security standards.                             Lead the evaluation and selection of technology platforms, tools, and frameworks to support innovation initiatives.                             Provide technical guidance and support to development teams throughout the solution implementation process.                             Conduct research and analysis to assess the feasibility and potential impact of new technologies and solutions.                             Collaborate with external partners and vendors to leverage their expertise and resources for innovation projects.                             Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in technology and industry trends, and share knowledge with the team.                             Participate in innovation workshops, brainstorming sessions, and other collaborative activities to generate and refine ideas.                             Mentor and coach team members on solution architecture best practices and emerging technologies.                               Requirements:                               Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Masters degree preferred.                             Proven experience as a Solution Architect, with a focus on designing and implementing innovative solutions.                             Strong technical expertise in areas such as cloud computing, microservices architecture, data analytics, and emerging technologies.                             Experience with solution architecture frameworks and methodologies, such as TOGAF or Zachman.                             Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) Architecture                             Proficient in programming languages and frameworks relevant to innovation projects.                             Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to evaluate complex technical challenges and propose innovative solutions.                             Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.                             Experience in project management and leading cross-functional teams.                             Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and dynamic environment, with a passion for continuous learning and innovation.                               Technologies:                               Machine Learning, Generative AI                             Augmented &Virtual Reality                             Python                             Cloud Native Technology                               Some Experience with design and documentation of data models with platforms, such as Salesforce, SAP Gigya, Google Data Studio, Web Content Management (Web CMS), Direct to Consumer Platforms, such as Shopify, Magento, Salesforce ecommerce                               Knowledge of Blockchain and Quantum Computing

column2: ?               Serve as a key technical member of the Business Development team in helping to ensure customer success in building applications and services on the AWS platform.            Scope each customer engagement, with attention towards clear and well-defined objectives and success criteria. Engage with partners developers, architects, designers, hardware engineers, project managers, and management teams. Own each technical engagement, and help ensure a timely and successful delivery of value.            Capture and share best-practice knowledge amongst the solution architect community. Able to create technical content that is easily adopted and reusable by others.            Your broad responsibilities will include: owning the technical engagement and ultimate success around specific implementation projects, and developing a deep expertise in the AWS technologies as well as broad know-how around how applications and services are constructed using the AWS platform. Help potential customers embrace latest Cloud Solution. Handling all Pre-Sales and Post-Sales activities. Understanding clients requirements and preparing RFI, RFP, RFQ Responses for Cloud based projects. Research on customers (company overview, market share, key contacts, incumbents etc.) Competition Intelligence / Analysis (Key Initiatives, market presence, strategy, SWOT analysis).           The ideal candidate will possess customer facing skills that will allow them to represent Workmates well within a customer s environment and drive discussions with senior personnel within the company, as well as a technical background that enables them to easily interact and give guidance to software developers and architects. He/she should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges. Experience architecting infrastructure solutions using both Linux/Unix and Windows with specific recommendations on server, load balancing, HA/DR, storage architectures. Provide technical training and consultation to strategical development partners. Root cause customer issues and provide resolution to unblock development or improve experience.               Basic Requirement:             Knowledge of Cloud and virtualized environments. Strong understanding about all available AWS cloud services in IaaS PaaS offerings. Understanding Customers requirements with respect to both Infra Application working / flow / deployment. 5+ years of design / implementation / consulting experience with distributed applications or equivalent education experience. 4+ years of hands-on Infrastructure / Troubleshooting / Systems Administration / Networking / DevOps / Applications Development experience in a distributed systems environment. Background in following or related to Technology Architect, Consultant, Cloud Architect, Technical Lead, Software Developer, Engineering Lead, Pre Sales Engineer or Systems Engineer.            Should have good knowledge on AWS, Enterprise Sales, presales, Cloud Migration. Good to basic understanding about different cloud platforms.            Technical degree required, Computer Science background is highly desired. As a Solutions Architect, you will have to help shape and deliver on a strategy to build mind share and broad use of Amazon s utility computing web services.            Good understanding of DevOps technologies such as CI/CD, Containers etc.            Would be an added advance if have capability to develop automation scripts (using Python / Jython / Shell / Power shell/ VB scripts) and batch files for automation of system and application administration on cloud. Familiarity with datacenter concepts and best practices, high-availability systems, capacity planning, system performance evaluation, and diagnostic techniques and methodologies           Must Have Certifications:                    AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate               Good to have Certifications:           AWS Certified Solutions Architect Professional.            AWS Certified DevOps Engineer Professional.            Thorough expertise/practice in software development is a great plus.            Experience with Service Mesh and Distributed tracing.            Exposure to assessment tools like Cloudamize, Risk etc.            Strong communication skills to effectively communicate, make strategic recommendations to Sr. Mgmt as well as all levels of internal/external service partners.            Create good presentations with all relevant information geared create SOW with proper understanding of the customers requirement.            Closed at least 4-5 Big Deals on Cloud Migration/ Workload Hosting/Application Development/SAAS Offering

The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. This position is based at our Chennai office. Qualification Bachelor's or Master's degr

column2: The Solution Architect will work closely with prospects, customers and internal teams to support pre-sales activities and to ensure that the customer s technical requirements are addressed. The role calls for an individual who is part Technologist, part Solutions Architect and part functional consultant. As the SA, you will own all facets of solutioning - including planning, elicitation, scoping, requirements gathering, communication, identifying potential risks and ultimately facilitating the success of the deal.           ?       What you'll Do                 The Solutions Architect provides strategic advice and tactical support to drive both direct and indirect sales       You will be the primary SME for a set of pre-sales consults during solicitation of the Talent Experience Management (TXM) platform with prospective customers     During this phase, you are expected to provide information and guidance to prospects on Phenom s capabilities, integration and data requirements to drive value realization adoption of the product, understand their problem statement/key business drivers and provide necessary recommendations solution options          Other Responsibilities include but not limited to:           Creating, defining driving scope, solutioning and estimation, thereby driving the statement of work activities.         Facilitating smooth handoffs between sales to services teams on solution delivery and clear articulation of in-scope and out-of-scope requirements.         You will also be involved in training and mentoring Phenom Partner implementation resources on the latest product/engineering roll out from an implementation/integrations stand point         You will internally liaise with appropriate product and engineering teams for proof of concept/ create solution prototypes to ensure proposed solution(s) not only meets the customer s needs but also aligns with the Product/Engineering roadmap feasibility.         Gain general understanding of Phenom s data security, governance and retention policies across the platform as it pertains specifically to GDPR/Privacy regulations.         Research/develop world class technical artifacts and documentation best practices such as Integration Playbooks, Integrated Solutions Documents, Functional requirements specifications, proof of concepts, wireframes etc         Research and analyze competitors product offerings and solution capabilities to assess Phenom s own technical maturity from an Implementation point of view and prepare to offer workable solutions as alternatives.         Participate in Vendor workshops for assessing integration and implementation capabilities to drive partnerships serving mutual interests.           What you've Done:           6+ years of hands-on technical consulting experience including designing/estimating and prototyping solutions for enterprise environments (SaaS is preferred).         Hands-on technical experience in integrations/data migrations/product provisioning etc         Understanding of Java/Web/Middleware technologies. You are not expected to write code, but you need to understand the technical requirements and decipher complex technical problems.         Understanding of common web technologies, SaaS platform architecture, Content Management systems and a working knowledge of HTML, XML, API, JavaScript, CSS, APIs (REST and SOAP), Authentication methods like Basic/OAuth2.0 etc         Strong understanding of software development methodologies, infrastructure architecture, and data management principles         Knowledge of Project Management Methodology and Software Development Life Cycles including Agile and Waterfall         Excellent verbal, written, and presentation skills to effectively communicate complex technical and business issues (and solutions) to diverse audiences         Ability to plan, organize, prioritize, and deliver multiple projects simultaneously.         Experience with PaaS (Platform as a Service) is a plus         Experience in Talent Acquisition/Human Resources technology is a huge asset           Benefits:           We want you to be your best self and to pursue your passions!         Health and wellness benefits/programs to support holistic employee health         Flexible hours and working schedules, as well as parental leave for new parents         Growing organization with career pathing and development opportunities         Tons of perks and extras in every location for all Phenoms
column11: Content management, XML, Project management, Consulting, Equity, Javascript, Agile, Presales, HTML, Middleware

column2: We are looking for      a Windows Solutions Architect          to join our Corporate Technology team        As a Windows Solutions Architect, you will be expected to leverage your extensive experience and technical expertise to design, implement, and optimize Windows-based solutions in enterprise environments      Ideal candidate will involve integrating various Windows products and services, ensuring seamless interoperability and alignment with business objectives      A deep understanding of Windows technologies, including Active Directory, Windows Server, and Microsoft Azure, will be essential, as well as proficiency in scripting languages like PowerShell and virtualization technologies      You will be responsible for designing scalable, resilient, and secure architectures while providing leadership and guidance to ensure successful project delivery and alignment with industry best practices            What you'll do:          Architectural Design: Lead the design and development of complex Windows-based solutions, ensuring alignment with business objectives and architectural principles.      Technical Leadership: Provide guidance and mentorship to engineering teams in the implementation of Windows-based solutions, ensuring best practices and adherence to industry standards.      Solution Development: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into scalable and secure Windows architectures, integrating with existing systems and technologies. Technology Evaluation: Research and evaluate emerging technologies and tools, recommending innovative solutions to enhance system performance, reliability, and security.      Risk Management: Identify and mitigate risks associated with Windows-based solutions, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and security standards.      Troubleshooting and Optimization: Investigate and resolve complex technical issues related to Windows infrastructure, optimizing performance, and minimizing downtime.      Documentation and Training: Create comprehensive technical documentation and deliver training sessions to educate stakeholders on Windows architecture and best practices.          What you'll need:          Experience: Minimum of 9+ years of experience in architecting and implementing Windows-based solutions in enterprise environments.      Product Integration: Proficiency in integrating various Windows products and services to create comprehensive solutions that meet business requirements.      Windows Solutioning: Demonstrated ability to design high-quality Windows solutions, including Windows Server, Active Directory, Microsoft Azure, and virtualization technologies & Microsoft Defender.      Understanding of Endpoint management services - Microsoft Intune is a must.      Demonstrate diverse experience and expertise across relevant domains.      Exhibit resourcefulness and independence in problem-solving and project management.      Ability to think critically, research effectively, and drive initiatives autonomously.      Good exposure towards implementing /administrating zero trust solutions like Zscaler & CrowdStrike and infrastructure management application solutioning like ManageEngine.      VM Solutioning: Strong background in virtualization technologies, particularly with VMWare or Hyper-V, including design, deployment, and optimization of virtualized environments.      Technical Skills: Advanced knowledge of Network Infrastructure and should be proficient in Network-based storage solutions, backup, and DR setup.      Architecture Design: Proven track record of designing scalable, resilient, and secure Windows architectures that align with business objectives and industry standards.      Communication: Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to diverse audiences.      Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues and implement effective solutions.      Certifications: Relevant certifications such as Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert, MCSE: Core Infrastructure, or VMWare Certified Professional (VCP) are highly desirable
column11: VMware, Infrastructure management, Project management, Active directory, Windows, microsoft, Troubleshooting, MCSE, Risk management, Virtualization

   Perform software architectural designs, configure the solution, develop customizations using Dynamics and the Power Platform, conduct code reviews and lead technical initiatives while prioritizing user questions and issues         Provide support of existing applications and integrations as necessary to support the Dynamics environment         Collaborate with infrastructure team, DBAs, and of Microsoft Dynamics 365 applications or technologies, including Field Service, CRM, Power Apps Portal, Power Automate and Integrations Architecture (to systems outside of D365)         Experience creating customizations, business process flows, and workflows for Dynamics 365         Experience taking complex business problems and providing solutions through out of the box configuration         Proven track record of delivering data driven solutions with a customer-first mindset         Strong customer service skills to provide end user/business owner systems support on high level issues column2: The opportunity We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Cloud Operations Technical Delivery Lead to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for leading the technical delivery aspects of multiple cloud operations initiatives, ensuring the successful deployment, management, and optimization of cloud-based systems and services. As a key member of the operations team,? Looking for Cloud Operations Technical Delivery Lead with 10 to 15 years experience in Cloud Domain You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to design, implement, and manage scalable and reliable cloud infrastructure solutions.? The Cloud Operations Technical Delivery Lead will also play a crucial role in driving innovation, best practices, and continuous improvement within the cloud operations domain.   Your key responsibilities Lead the technical delivery of cloud operations projects, from planning and design through implementation and optimization. Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements, define project scope, and establish technical specifications for cloud-based systems and services. Oversee incident and problem management, ensuring minimal impact on service deliverables and prompt resolution. Coordinate technical professionals in charge of root cause analysis, providing preventive measures and long-term solutions. Lead the Cloud Operations team for industry standard certifications in Managed cloud operations such as MSP, AWS Managed Service etc. Champion the culture of continuous service improvement and service excellence by adopting industry best practices like ITIL, DevOps, & Lean? Coordinate the entire lifecycle of cloud services from design, implementation, to end of life, collaborating with architects, security teams, and other stakeholders. Manage the delivery and performance of cloud services, ensuring SLA compliance and customer satisfaction. Provide guidance and expertise to the operations team, ensuring adherence to established standards and procedures throughout the project lifecycle. Manage the deployment and configuration of cloud resources, including compute, storage, networking, and security components, using automation and orchestration tools. Oversee the monitoring, performance tuning, and troubleshooting of cloud environments to maintain optimal system health, availability, and performance. Implement robust security controls and compliance measures to safeguard sensitive data and ensure regulatory compliance within cloud environments. Collaborate with DevOps teams to integrate continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines and automate deployment workflows for cloud-based applications and services. Drive innovation and continuous improvement initiatives within the cloud operations domain, exploring new technologies, tools, and methodologies to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. Act as a point of escalation for cloud-related technical issues, providing expert advice and steering for informed decision-making. Mentor and coach junior team members, nurturing a culture of learning, collaboration, and excellence within the cloud operations team. Skills and attributes for success In-depth knowledge of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and services, including compute, storage, networking, and security. Proven experience in technical leadership roles, with a focus on cloud operations, infrastructure, and architecture. Experience in managing technical teams in complex cloud environments, including multi-cloud infrastructures spanning in multizone environment. Experience in leading 3 to 5 managed service engagements in Cloud Platform / Application solutions Experience in delivering Cloud operations engagement align with industry standard Cloud frameworks. Excellent understanding of ITSM best practices with several years of experience in technical service delivery Experience in leading or worked as team member to achieve Managed services certifications such as MSP or AWS MS etc Proficiency in using scripting languages (Python, Bash) and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible for automating cloud service deployments. Understanding about cloud automation and orchestration tools (e.g., Terraform, BICEP, Ansible, Kubernetes) and infrastructure-as-code (IaC) principles. Familiarity with containerization technologies (like Kubernetes or Docker), microservices architecture, and serverless computing. Technical expertise in DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and agile methodologies. Proficiency in scripting and programming languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell, Bash). Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, capable of interacting with both technical and non-technical stakeholders confidently. Certifications in Industry governance standards like ITIL, TOGAF etc. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions on time and within budget. Relevant certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert, or Google Cloud Professional Architect are a plus. Proficiency and expertise in delivering operations in Data platform is a must. To qualify for the role, you must have. Bachelors degree in engineering, IT, Computer Science etc. Relevant certifications in Cloud and Infrastructure Landscape. This enhances a candidate's qualifications and demonstrate their expertise in cloud operations and architecture. Ideally, youll also have Technical Expertise Leadership Experience Problem-Solving Skills Communication Skills Continuous Learning Project Management Experience

column2: The Technical Advisory Group (TAG) at Phenom is responsible for enabling our sales and account management teams to meet their organizational mandates. This team is responsible for providing technical subject matter expertise and best practices on custom solutions at the product and platform layers. This team also owns the technical governance related to all external integrations of the Phenom platform.         The Technical Advisor (TA) will work closely with prospects, customers and internal teams to support pre-sales activities and to ensure that the customer s technical requirements are addressed. The role calls for an individual who is part Technologist, part Solutions Architect and part functional consultant.          As the TA, you will own all facets of solutioning - including planning, elicitation, scoping, requirements gathering, communication, identifying potential risks and ultimately facilitating the success of the deal.           What you'll Do                 The Technical Advisor provides strategic advice and tactical support to drive both direct and indirect sales       You will be the primary SME for a set of pre-sales consults during solicitation of the Talent Experience Management (TXM) platform with prospective customers     During this phase, you are expected to provide information and guidance to prospects on Phenom s capabilities, integration and data requirements to drive value realization adoption of the product, understand their problem statement/key business drivers and provide necessary recommendations solution options          Other Responsibilities include but not limited to:           Creating, defining driving scope, solutioning and estimation, thereby driving the statement of work activities.         Facilitating smooth handoffs between sales to services teams on solution delivery and clear articulation of in-scope and out-of-scope requirements.         You will also be involved in training and mentoring Phenom Partner implementation resources on the latest product/engineering roll out from an implementation/integrations stand point         You will internally liaise with appropriate product and engineering teams for proof of concept/ create solution prototypes to ensure proposed solution(s) not only meets the customer s needs but also aligns with the Product/Engineering roadmap feasibility.         Gain general understanding of Phenom s data security, governance and retention policies across the platform as it pertains specifically to GDPR/Privacy regulations.         Research/develop world class technical artifacts and documentation best practices such as Integration Playbooks, Integrated Solutions Documents, Functional requirements specifications, proof of concepts, wireframes etc         Research and analyze competitors product offerings and solution capabilities to assess Phenom s own technical maturity from an Implementation point of view and prepare to offer workable solutions as alternatives.         Participate in Vendor workshops for assessing integration and implementation capabilities to drive partnerships serving mutual interests.           What you've Done:           6+ years of hands-on technical consulting experience including designing/estimating and prototyping solutions for enterprise environments (SaaS is preferred).         Hands-on technical experience in integrations/data migrations/product provisioning etc         Understanding of Java/Web/Middleware technologies. You are not expected to write code, but you need to understand the technical requirements and decipher complex technical problems.         Understanding of common web technologies, SaaS platform architecture, Content Management systems and a working knowledge of HTML, XML, API, JavaScript, CSS, APIs (REST and SOAP), Authentication methods like Basic/OAuth2.0 etc         Strong understanding of software development methodologies, infrastructure architecture, and data management principles         Knowledge of Project Management Methodology and Software Development Life Cycles including Agile and Waterfall         Excellent verbal, written, and presentation skills to effectively communicate complex technical and business issues (and solutions) to diverse audiences         Ability to plan, organize, prioritize, and deliver multiple projects simultaneously.         Experience with PaaS (Platform as a Service) is a plus         Experience in Talent Acquisition/Human Resources technology is a huge asset           Benefits:           We want you to be your best self and to pursue your passions!         Health and we'llness benefits/programs to support holistic employee health         Flexible hours and working schedules, as we'll as parental leave for new parents         Growing organization with career pathing and development opportunities         Tons of perks and extras in every location for all Phenoms

column2: We at Innovaccer are looking for an    Enterprise Solution Architect    which plays a pivotal role in guiding data strategy, platform positioning, and digital transformation vision for our customers. The Enterprise Solution Architect provides architecture frameworks andvisualsand custom solution guidance to enable the customers right solution. The Enterprise Solution Architect will also guide marketing on designing outreach programs and work with the product on developing the platform roadmap.        Your work will focus on 4 key areas:       a) collaboration with the sales and partnership teams team to define our strategy and approach to win Innovaccer slargestand most complex deals     b) define and execute the strategies to drive exponential growth for the organization     c) collaboration with the customer success team to structure and execute our expansion strategy at existing customers, and      d) define the solution architecture to address a customer s need, adapting Innovaccer solutions to the client s environment       A Day in the Life         Drive large and complex high-priority technology/platform deals. Quickly develop a solution on clients pain points,layout architecture diagrams, and map data needs and strategy; work collaboratively with the product, sales,marketing, and external partners to design solutions.     Drive analytics and research, and build a pitchdeck; developBusiness cases/ROI to support deal progression/closure.     Support Clinical workflow/operations (most important) and Business (second most important) conversationsfor assigned accounts.     Demonstrate Innovaccer products and architecture, have discussions about Innovaccer solutions withclients.     Be the technology face of Innovaccer to the customer on our most critical deals.     Coordinate end-to-end what s needed for those deals - all Content/Collateral Building - PPTs, Proposals, NurtureMaterials, etc.     Take ownership of internal follow-ups associated with assigned deals.     Collaborate with other Innovaccer teams such as product, implementation, delivery, and colleagues from SME to develop engaging proposals, presentations, and RFP responses         What You Need         Masters in Computer science or equivalent from a top school.     Self-starters Should be able to apply critical thinking in fast-moving environments without relying ondocumented steps.     Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple priorities effectively.     Adept at working cross-functionally to meet aggressive deadlines while maintaining professionalismandpoise.     Exceptional client-facing and presentation skills.     Exceptional verbal and written communication skills. Expert at presenting ideas using slides. Ability to write to, and speak with C-suite executives in a way that creates confidence and credibility - to is seen as very worthy of their time and attention.     Willing to travel frequently to client sites (once work travel resume, will work from home to start with)     Willing to work in a fast-paced environment under tight deadlines         Preferred Skills         Solution Architect     Consulting Experience     Stakeholder Management     Sales solution

column2: Project Role : Business Architect Project Role Description : Define opportunities to create tangible business value for the client by leading current state assessments and identifying high level customer requirements, defining the business solutions and structures needed to realize these opportunities, and developing business case to achieve the vision.  Must have skills : Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP Technical, Functional Test Planning-Preparation-Execution Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Minimum 15 years of education Summary :As a D365 Security Specialist, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining security measures within Microsoft Dynamics 365 (D365) environments. Your role involves ensuring that data and applications within D365 are protected from unauthorized access, breaches, and other security risks. You will collaborate closely with IT teams, business stakeholders, and third-party vendors to develop and enforce security policies, procedures, and best practices.  Roles & Responsibilities: Security Architecture Design:Design and implement security architecture for D365 environments, including role-based access controls (RBAC), user provisioning, authentication mechanisms, and data encryption. Access Control Management:Manage user access to D365 applications, data, and functionalities based on business roles and responsibilities. Implement segregation of duties (SoD) controls to prevent conflicts of interest and enforce compliance requirements. Identity and Authentication Management:Configure and manage identity providers, single sign-on (SSO), and multi-factor authentication (MFA) solutions to ensure secure user authentication and authorization within D365. Security Monitoring and Incident Response:Monitor D365 environments for security threats, vulnerabilities, and anomalous activities. Develop and implement incident response plans to address security incidents promptly and effectively. Security Policy Development:Develop and enforce security policies, standards, and guidelines for D365 usage, data handling, and access management. Regularly review and update security policies to align with evolving threats and regulatory requirements. Security Compliance:Ensure D365 environments comply with relevant regulatory standards, such as GDPR, HIPAA, SOC 2, and industry-specific regulations. Conduct periodic security audits and assessments to identify compliance gaps and implement remediation measures. Security Training and Awareness:Provide security training and awareness programs to D365 users and stakeholders to promote security best practices, mitigate risks, and foster a culture of security awareness across the organization. Vendor Management:Collaborate with third-party vendors and service providers to ensure the security of D365 integrations, extensions, and customizations. Evaluate vendor security controls and assess their adherence to contractual security requirements. Documentation and Reporting:Maintain documentation of D365 security configurations, policies, and procedures. Generate regular security reports and metrics to track security posture, incidents, and compliance status. Professional & Technical Skills: Proven experience in designing, implementing, and managing security controls within Microsoft Dynamics 365 FO environments. In-depth knowledge of D365 security features, including role-based security, data encryption, and authentication mechanisms. Strong analytical skills and the ability to assess security risks, identify vulnerabilities, and develop effective mitigation strategies. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. Experience with security incident response, threat intelligence, and security monitoring tools. Ability to stay updated on emerging security trends, technologies, and threats affecting D365 environments. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 10 years of experience in Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP Technical / AX Technical. Should have completed at least 1 certification in Dynamics365 FO. This position is based at our Chennai office. Qualification Minimum 15 years of education

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled Digital Senior Business Analyst at LITC to join our dynamic team     As a key liaison between business stakeholders and technical teams, the Digital Senior Business Analyst will contribute to the development and execution of innovative solutions, ensuring efficiency and seamlessness in the digital experience for both internal teams and users     This role requires a candidate who can effectively bridge the geographical gap, providing valuable support to US stakeholders and contributing to the overall success of digital initiatives                       ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES       1. Collaborate closely with onsite Product Owners to gather and document detailed requirements for digital solutions, ensuring a clear understanding of project goals and objectives.   2. Serve as a key liaison between offshore development teams and onsite stakeholders, facilitating effective communication and alignment on project deliverables.   3. Collaborate with offshore and onsite teams to identify potential challenges, propose solutions, and contribute to the successful execution of projects in alignment with business goals.   4. Conduct comprehensive analyses of existing processes, adeptly identifying areas for improvement and optimization.   5. Document as-is and to-be process models using swimlanes, identifying aspects of requirements understanding, business process flows, and functional gaps necessary to accomplish the desired acceptance criteria.   6. Work closely with technical teams to design and implement integrations between digital platforms, ensuring a seamless data flow for transactions.   7. Collaborate with UX/UI teams to elevate the user experience of digital platforms.   8. Manage day-to-day operations closely with cross-functional teams to ensure SLAs are met; troubleshoot data and process issues, workflows, and business procedures, and make recommendations for necessary changes.   9. Develop User Acceptance Testing (UAT) test cases and support UAT with cross-functional teams to ensure system implementation complies with business requirements.   10. Recommend improvements to support and optimize processes and execution of tasks; provide support to leadership through training and coaching on continuous improvement principles.   11. Utilize reporting channels for in-depth analysis and reporting on system performance, success metrics, and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).   12. Demonstrate exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail; adept at juggling and prioritizing multiple tasks simultaneously.   13. Work proactively to bridge the geographical gap, participating in remote meetings, and maintaining open lines of communication to address queries and provide project updates.             Qualifications         Ability to support US working hours, extending until 12pm CT, to facilitate effective communication and collaboration with US stakeholders.     bachelors degree in a relevant field (eg, business, computer science).     4 to 8 years of proven experience working as a Business Analyst or a technical product owner in a cross-functional team, with a specialized focus on digital solutions.     Solid experience and understanding of Agile Scrum and Rational Unified Process Methodology, including the development of use cases, use case models.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, essential for effective collaboration and stakeholder engagement.     Familiarity with project management tools such as DevOps, Jira, or similar platforms, enhancing efficiency in task and project management.     Experience with eCommerce, Platform as a Service (PaaS), Software as a Service (SaaS), and Data as a Service (DaaS) platforms is considered a plus.

You will use PMS to improve communications and accountability on our projects internally and externally. Conforming with the policies and procedures for customer communication and the specification process. Using available tools and techniques to validate the functionality, stability, usability, and performance etc.       Validation:       Test and validate new integrations with the product and interface with the 3rd party where required to resolve issues. Customer Training:       You will work closely with the customer team to train on the configuration and use of the integration.       Subject Matter Expertise:       Provide internal and external support on all company product functionality related to integrations. Architecture Design:       Is responsible for designing various architectures for integrations. The architecture design may also include designing and mapping various technologies. Good understanding of data mapping and sheets for migrating data into Fulfil.     Run pre-existing integration adoption projects with the merchant. Knowledge of various architectures and protocols such as REST, XML, FTP, WSDL, etc.     Excellent writing, editing, and interpersonal skills     Able to grasp new concepts; understand system processes and new technologies     Able to work independently or in collaboration with others     Exceptional organizational skills     Ability to manage time effectively and work on multiple projects and priorities with limited supervision     Intuitive, self-motivated with excellent problem-solving ability     Familiarity with software and API commonly used in this industry (for example, Shopify, Amazon, Fulfillment, etc.)
