column2: Cloud Strategy Development    : Develop and maintain the companys overall cloud strategy, aligning it with business goals and objectives. This involves understanding the organizations needs, current infrastructure, and future growth plans.        Cloud Architecture Design    : Design the architecture of cloud-based solutions, including selecting appropriate cloud services (e.g., IaaS, PaaS, SaaS), designing network configurations, and defining data storage and security strategies.        Infrastructure Provisioning    : Oversee the provisioning of cloud infrastructure, including virtual machines, databases, storage, and networking resources. Ensure that resources are provisioned efficiently and cost-effectively.        Security and Compliance    : Implement security best practices and compliance requirements within the cloud environment. This involves configuring access controls, encryption, and monitoring systems to protect data and applications from unauthorized access and breaches.        Performance Optimization    : Continuously optimize the performance of cloud-based applications and services. Monitor resource utilization, identify bottlenecks, and implement solutions to improve efficiency and scalability.        Cost Management    : Manage cloud costs and budget effectively. Monitor usage and spending, identify cost-saving opportunities, and implement strategies to optimize resource utilization and reduce expenses.        Cloud Migration and Integration    : Lead cloud migration projects, including planning, execution, and testing. Integrate cloud services with existing on-premises infrastructure and third-party systems to ensure seamless operation.        Collaboration and Communication    : Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and business stakeholders, to gather requirements, define solutions, and communicate project status and updates.        Emerging Technologies Evaluation    : Stay abreast of the latest trends and developments in cloud computing and related technologies. Evaluate new tools, services, and best practices to enhance the organizations cloud strategy and capabilities.        Documentation and Training    : Create documentation, guidelines, and best practices for cloud architecture and operations. Provide training and support to internal teams to ensure proper usage and maintenance of cloud resources.
column11: Cloud computing, Usage, Resource utilization, Architecture, Cloud Services, PAAS, Cloud, Infrastructure, cloud architect, Monitoring

column2: As a Cloud Architect, you will be responsible for designing and implementing cloud solutions and architectures within an organization.      Play a crucial role in establishing best cloud practices across the company by identifying and selecting the most cost-efficient cloud providers while ensuring easy access to data storage.        Key Responsibilities:        Design cloud-based architecture solutions to meet the organization s technical and business requirements.          Lead the migration of on-premises applications and infrastructure to cloud platforms, such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.          Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and security experts, to ensure a seamless transition to the cloud.          Establish and document cloud architecture best practices and standards.          Select appropriate cloud services, technologies, and tools to meet project and infrastructure needs.          Create and maintain detailed system documentation, diagrams, and architecture blueprints.          Optimize cloud environments for cost-efficiency, scalability, and performance.          Implement and enforce security measures and best practices to protect cloud-based systems and data.          Monitor cloud infrastructure performance and make proactive improvements.          Stay up-to-date with emerging cloud technologies and best practices and recommend their adoption when appropriate.        Requirements:        Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent work experience). A Master s degree may be preferred. column2: The IT Solution Architect plays a key role in translating business requirements into effective and scalable technology solutions. This individual is responsible for designing, implementing, and managing complex IT architectures that support and enhance business processes. The IT Solution Architect works closely with various stakeholders, including business leaders, enterprise architects, project managers, developers, and system administrators, to ensure the successful delivery of IT solutions. Min 12+ years of experience with at least 5-7 years of experience as a Solution Architect .       Key Responsibilities:                Solution Design:    Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their requirements and objectives. Design end-to-end solutions that meet business needs, considering scalability, security, performance, and other relevant factors. Create and maintain detailed architecture documentation.       Technical Leadership:    Provide technical leadership and guidance to development teams during the implementation phase. Ensure that the implemented solutions align with the overall architectural vision. Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies to recommend innovative solutions.       Stakeholder Collaboration:    Work closely with business analysts to understand and refine functional requirements. Collaborate with project managers to estimate the effort required for solution implementation. Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.       Technology Evaluation:    Evaluate and recommend technologies, tools, and frameworks that align with the organization's strategy. Conduct feasibility studies and assess the potential impact of technology choices.       Risk Management:    Identify potential risks associated with the proposed solutions and recommend mitigation strategies. Ensure compliance with security and regulatory standards in all architectural decisions.       Quality Assurance:    Collaborate with quality assurance teams to define testing strategies and ensure the quality of delivered solutions. Participate in code reviews and architectural inspections.         Requirements:           Bachelor s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). Proven experience as a Solution Architect or in a similar role.               Technical Skills:    In-depth knowledge of various IT domains, including application development, databases, networking, and cloud technologies. Experience with architectural frameworks and methodologies. Proficiency in modelling and design tools       Problem-Solving:    Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Ability to make decisions that balance technical and business considerations.       Relevant certifications    such as TOGAF, AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert, ITIL certifications, Systems Engineering certs such as MCSE/MCSA, Hypervisors such as VMWare VCP, VCAP, VCDX, Nutanix, etc., Networking Cisco CCNA, CCIE, or equivalent in Juniper, CompTIA Security+, all beneficial toward well-rounded candidate.
column11: Computer science, VMware, Manager Quality Assurance, Ccie, TOGAF, Application development, CCNA, MCSE, Risk management, Information technology

Must have skills : Accenture Delivery Methods (ADM) Good to have skills : AWS Administration, SAP HANA Cloud, SAP ABAP Cloud Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Any Degree Role Description:Critical Application Recovery Manager for an Application Outsourcing engagement is required to manage Application and Infrastructure events that cause business disruption. The role requires individual to oversee and coordinating the response to high-impact application incidents across multiple projects. This role involves leading a specialized team that responds to critical incidents in Application Outsourcing space, such as security breaches, major service outages, or emergencies, take leadership role of driving resolution, working with various groups involved in service restoration, ensure that right level of support is extracted across all groups including technology providers like Microsoft, Cisco, EMC, SAP, Oracle etc. Requires regular updates to all stakeholders with clear business impact. Primary goal of this individual is to act with an I own mindset to manage the situation to resolution and make all possible efforts to minimize the business Impact. Responsibilities may also include providing application expertise for leading cross-functional teams during incidents, assessing impact, coordinating communication with stakeholders and executives, ensuring rapid and effective resolution and conducting post-incident analysis for continuous improvement. Competencies required:1.Good understanding of IT systems both Infrastructure and Applications2.Building good understanding of clients business process3.Ability to take leadership role in outages / critical situations when IT systems are down and there is a business impact4.Good Communication skills (verbal and written) and ability to sustain pressure5.Proactive thinking6.Build relationships with stakeholders 7.Experience with service management modules Technical Skills:1.10-12 years of Hands-on experience of Application service management for leading ERP systems such as Microsoft Dynamics CRM, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, SAP S/4 HANA, SAP RISE, Mulesoft and/or Oracle E-Business Suite.2.Good knowledge of DevOps methodologies, CI/CD pipelines, change and release management controls.3.Knowledge of code design, construction, testing, debugging, version control and technical design documentation.4.Functional knowledge of one or more industry verticals/market segments like Banking, Airlines, Ecommerce, Energy, Manufacturing, Utilities etc.5.Experience of cloud computing and excellent knowledge of Hybrid Cloud an on premise applications/business models.6.Knowledge of business process workflow, monitoring tools, service bus and integrations.7.Flexible to work as part of a follow the sun support team8.Crisis management/critical incident management skills.Good To have: Infrastructure/Admin knowledge. Cloud Computing experience Certification in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Oracle, Google) is highly regarded Architectural exposure is good to have. column2: As a Digital Experience Platform (DXP) Architect, you will be responsible for owning world-class Content Management applications that support eCommerce, marketing, print and other channels for strategic and ad hoc initiatives. You will act as a leader of change to the IT and Business Partners while driving the corporate vision. You will do this by building strong partnerships in eCommerce, marketing, and technology that will result in substantial and demonstrable digital maturity growth for Kohler IT.                                                             You will proactively identify improvement opportunities to leverage technology to improve business capabilities. You will collaborate with internal and external partners to ensure that technology decisions and frameworks align with the overall Enterprise Architecture vision and state. You will further Petco's vision for technology and lead strategies to innovate and solve business needs.                                                                     As such, proven experience in delivering eCommerce(AEM, NextJS, NodeJS) solutions is necessary to lead large and complex multi-technology agile, waterfall and hybrid projects. You will need to possess the skills to interact, negotiate, and work alongside a broad range of engineers, project managers, quality assurance leads, product managers and sponsors/stakeholders.                                                                       What you'll do:                                                                       Innovation                                             Analyze current architecture to identify weaknesses and develop opportunities for improvement with respect to tech debt, expanding capacity to support emerging business processes, reducing time and cost, and increasing overall effectiveness.                 Apply industry standard Design Patterns for application development in Enterprise Content Management practice.                 Participate in relevant industry groups and networks with industry peers to gain knowledge and share ideas to say current on industry trends. Leverage relevant research to drive improvements through emerging technology adoption. An expert at scaling functions to the next level by building relationships and developing technology solutions from concept to implementation. Manage the system portfolio for the business domains to ensure health, stability and strategic fit.                                       Accountable for all SDLC aspects (estimating, technical design, implementation, documentation, testing, deployment and support). On as needed basis, assesses requirements, designs, test plans, deployment plans and performs peer reviews.                 Able to decompose project scope into multi-phase/generation projects, owns the Solution Architecture Document, engages on prototype development / demonstration for new concepts and technology.                 Review and influence requirements for clarity, quality and feasibility.                 Advise on the translation of business requirements into system-level stories and/or designs; participates in business vs technical enrichment exercises. Maintains governing standards.                 Assist in capacity planning and performance management. This includes but is not limited to hardware platforms, network, security, storage, operating systems, and infrastructure software and tools.                 Assist in management, continuous improvement, calibration and training of the onshore/offshore support teams.                                       ROI                                       Lead the development of digital transformation activities to optimize cost and deliver on required business outcomes. Influence change opportunities and investments to achieve the target state. Describe the path forward regarding use of technology and champions the reduction of technology obsolescence.                 Determine which technology investments will yield the best return, both in terms of hard costs and productivity benefits.                 Produce designs for cost effective solutions that take into consideration project and operational expenses. Architecture                                       Develop as is and to be state architecture designs and a corresponding roadmap to achieve the target state across multiple business domains. Maintain an organization-wide view of current and future business and application architecture and communicates across all levels of the organization to educate and inform the impact of change.                 Provide a comprehensive technical solution for enterprise structured and unstructured data that is aligned with and supports business goals. Propose alternatives considering business and technology constraints as well as opportunities. Drive alignment of business solutions to architectural standards.                 Design solutions following patterns and guidelines that promote operational stability, disaster recovery, availability, performance, and best practices in systems management.                 Lead in a Services Oriented Architecture space. Define the integration standards, patterns, governance, and tooling that will support current and future integration needs. Perform service discovery, registration, sets deployment topologies, security policies as per consumption needs. Address legacy integration methods and technologies in context.                 Lead in development and delivery of microservice enabled architectures. column2: A Solution Architect (SA) is a strategic position to our customers within the professional services organisation.                                                                                  The solution architects are usually senior consultants that collaborate with a broader solution development team to design technical blueprints for solutions and implementation plans encompassing software and hardware aspects. Solution Architects are highly experienced consultants and subject matter experts with strong technical skills, architecture principles and Marketing industry knowledge.                                                                                                                                                  Responsibilities:                                                                                                                                                                                                            Creates the overall technical vision for a specific solution to a business problem.                              Understand business and technical requirements and provide recommendations and roadmaps for proposed solutions aligned with business strategy.                                      Advocating for process improvements and helping develop solutions.                                      Proactively identify, define, and maintain architectural artifacts to promote design and developmentimplementation consistency of systems and applications, or to reduce time to market, cost, and technical risk.                                      Provide solution architecture consulting in conducting discovery workshops, analyse clients business processes, assess feasibility, and recommend multiple approaches typically exploring new technology components and solutions.                                      Provide specifications according to which the solution is defined, managed, and delivered.                                      Creating a solution design & architecture and provide a solution design walkthrough to the client and various stakeholders and work with the client in obtaining the sign-off on the recommended solution.                                      Responsible for technical leadership, setting up standards & best practices and enforce across various stages of the project development.                                      Collaborate with project managers for estimations, project planning, risk management and delivery.                                      Oversight of the development and configuration of the technical solution, integrations and ascertain quality delivery.                                      Responsible for creating solution design documents that includes Solution Architecture, High-level Design, specification, and non-functional requirements.                                      Join the development team in creating proof-of-conceptsprototypes, technical point of views and solutionplatform comparisons for the stated business problems.                                      Constantly upskill and stay up to date with the latest releases of the technology, relevant technology trends and competitive products in the market.                                      Support Sales Team for the pre-sales activities including technical questionnaire, platformsolutionintegration recommendations, solution architecture, estimates, proposal presentation etc.,                                      Responsible for direct communication with the client in technical discussions, WIP meetings, IncidentEscalation meetings etc & establish very good rapport with the client.                                        Qualification:                                            10+ years of overall IT experience with at least 3+ years of experience as a Solution Architect with a strong hand-on experience in providing solution designs.                                          2+ years of working experience in designing and development of any integrations through any middleware solutions OR custom Integrations using any programming language.                                      2+ years of working experience in unified modeling language in designing and building software s.                                      2+ years of working expertise in any Marketing Technology Platforms such as AEP, AJO, RTCDP etc.,                                      2+ years of working experience in any one of the BI & Analytics Tools like GA, Power-BI, Tableau or others.                                      Good knowledge in one of the cloud-based technologies such as AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform, and others                                      Good knowledge in one of the open-source technology tools such as CMS, eCommerce, CRM, and ERP etc.,                                      Good knowledge in any Android, iOS, PWA Applications mobile technology                                      Knowledge in any of the APIs such as SOAP, REST and GraphQL.                                      Excellent verbal, interpersonal and written communication skills                                      Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making capabilities                                      Bachelor s degree in computer science, Engineering, or an associated field

column2: As a Solution Architect, you will take ownership of defining, developing, and implementing solutions within our Enterprise Architecture.      You will collaborate with customers, development, and business groups to guide, advise, and communicate on critical architectural principles.      You will research and stay current with new technologies and innovation to help create and identify potential new solutions.        Responsibilities        Partnering with Architects and cross-functional technical teams to provide consultancy, leadership, communication and to promote software engineering best-practices.      Defining and implementing a technology strategy for Elsevier s global and regional eCommerce solutions.      Aligning with business requirements and ability to generate new ideas and innovations.      Working with the technology delivery teams by providing architecture and design guidance. You will be responsible for reviewing changes, guiding large development projects and technical evaluations of new technology.      Researching and assessing industry and technology advancements and developments to identify opportunities to advance our technical capabilities.        Requirements        Experience in defining and implementing architecture solutions supporting eCommerce activities.      Experience with Adobe Commerce (Magento) technology will be a significant advantage.      Demonstrate experience in defining and maintaining solution roadmaps.      Have knowledge of large multinational enterprises and their associated back-office business processes and data including Sales, Finance, Marketing and Business Intelligence.      Experience of architecting cloud-native solutions with AWS, Azure etc.      Demonstrate excellent written, verbal and presentation skills including communicating complex technical content to a range of audiences.      Enjoy collaborating and leading teams to design a strategy to solve problems and implement innovative solutions.

column2: We are looking for an eCommerce Solution Architect to design solutions tailored to business needs for our esteemed clients     This position presents the opportunity to work on client-facing, team-based projects, on a modern development stack, with a focus on CPG and Retail business and Commerce in general     You will participate in all aspects of the commerce project lifecycle, while solving challenging technical problems for our clients               Job Description           As a Solution Architect, you will play a pivotal role in translating business requirements into scalable, reliable, and secure technology solutions for Consumer Business unit catering to Retail, Travel, Media and Entertainment Industry customers       You will collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand their needs and design innovative solutions that align with organizational objectives     Your expertise in architecture principles, technology trends, and industry best practices will drive the development of robust solutions that meet both current and future business needs             Responsibilities:           Requirement Analysis:    Work closely with business stakeholders to gather and analyse requirements, ensuring a deep understanding of business processes, objectives, and challenges.       Solution Design:    Design end-to-end solutions that address business needs, leveraging appropriate technologies, architectures, and methodologies. Ensure solutions are scalable, flexible, and aligned with enterprise architecture standards.       Technical Guidance:    Provide technical guidance to development teams throughout the solution development lifecycle. Mentor team members on architecture best practices and design principles.       Architecture Development:    Develop and maintain architecture artifacts, including architectural diagrams, design documents, and technical specifications. Ensure consistency and coherence across the solution architecture.       Application Development:    Contribute towards Application development, Code reviews , define and develop Architecture runway for new initiatives.       Prototyping and Proof of Concept:    Develop prototypes and proof-of-concept implementations to validate design concepts and demonstrate feasibility. Iterate on designs based on feedback and testing results.       Collaboration:    Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including development, infrastructure, operations, and security teams within organization and customer organization to ensure seamless integration of components and alignment with objectives.       Performance Optimization:    Identify opportunities for performance optimization and scalability improvements within existing solutions. Implement optimizations to enhance system performance and reliability.       Continuous Learning:    Stay abreast of emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in solution architecture. Continuously enhance knowledge and skills through self-study, training, and participation in professional communities.       Contribute to New Business Opportunities:   1. Provide solutioning of RFPs received from clients and ensure overall design assurance. Contribute towards estimation for Tech Solution designed.            Qualifications:         Bachelors or Masters degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related field with 12+ years of experience.     Proven track record in creating business value for Organization through technology solutions and Platform Implementations.     Proven experience as a Solution Architect or similar role in Retail / Ecommerce Domain, with a strong track record of designing and implementing complex solutions.     Proven experience in any Retail ECommerce platform / implementation /customization or bespoke commerce capabilities development for enterprise customers.     In-depth knowledge of software architecture principles, design patterns, and architectural styles (eg, microservices, event-driven architecture) and hands-on experience in implementation of Architecture patterns and styles.     Proficiency in one or more programming languages (eg, Java, Python, C#) and familiarity with modern software development practices (Agile, DevOps,SAFE).     Strong expertise in understanding business domains and tailor technology solutions for business problems.     Experience with cloud computing platforms (eg, AWS, Azure, GCP) and familiarity with cloud-native architectures.     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and develop innovative solutions to business challenges.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with diverse stakeholders at all levels of the organization.     Relevant certifications (eg, AWS Certified Solutions Architect, TOGAF) are a plus.     Self-driven professional with ability to work independently with Clients and deliver on Artifacts.

column2: TekLink International, Inc. has been assisting global customers since 2003 bringing data to life as their Trusted Analytics and Planning partner. At TekLink, we have over 18 years of experience implementing analytics and planning solutions. As an Anaplan Partner since 2015, our Anaplan practice assists clients to design, implement and optimize planning solutions in finance, supply chain, marketing, and other use cases.  We serve customers across multiple industries including, Consumer Packaged Goods (CPG), Manufacturing, Technology, Higher Education and Public institutions. Majority of our customers are renowned fortune 500 organizations. What you will do at TekLink We are looking for dynamic and result oriented Anaplan Consultants to join our fast-growing Anaplan practice. Ideal candidates would be a self-motivated and result oriented professionals with a passion for business analytics, data modelling, and planning. Candidates would possess right experience in areas of Financial or Supply Chain planning and have excellent problem solving and analytical skills along with superb written and oral communication skills to develop solutions that delight our customers. Some of your responsibilities would include:  Work closely with the Business (Finance / SCM) to gather the requirement. Understand existing landscape and business objectives of the customers. Translate existing solutions, complex spreadsheets and business problems into elegant, intuitive and optimal Anaplan multi-dimensional models.  Modify existing solutions to enhance, optimize, or to incorporate new functionality. Ensure high quality of deliverables from self and team. Provide candid, meaningful feedback and regular progress updates to the team and customer. What we are looking for: Candidate should have total experience of 4-8 years in IT Industry. Minimum 4-6 years of experience in relevant Anaplan development and successfully implementing Anaplan solutions on minimum to implementation projects. Hands on experience on solutioning Anaplan models on Financial Planning & Analysis use case.  Hands on experience in implementing/support Agile projects in Financial/Sales Forecasting/Workforce planning using Anaplan Technology. Integration experience with any tool to lead the Anaplan data integrations with different systems. Experience with ALM & Anaplan Way implementation Methodology. Should be certified Anaplan Solution Architect.  Should have deep understanding of multi-dimensional modeling, PLANUAL best practices. Preferred to have very good functional knowledge in FP&A or Supply Chain areas.  Should be able to lead and mentor the team members. Excellent verbal/written communication skills is a must.  Working at TekLink At TekLink our employees get an open and collaborative environment and gain experience working for customers in various industries while solving complex business problems. They get support to learn new technologies as well as to enhance existing skills to further their career growth.  We offer: Very competitive renumeration  Excellent Benefits including  Hot Skills allowance, Shift allowance, Health, accidental and Life coverage. Excellent performance based annual increments. Fast paced growth opportunities International work experience Opportunity to participate in various sports and CSR activities.

column2: The candidate should be an Electrical Engineering graduate with approximately 5-7 years of experience in the field of project electrical engineering.     In project electrical engineering, the scope is engineering of Outdoor Switchyard, Indoor Substation and E-House projects in bid and execution phase. column2: Ensemble Health Partners, we're at the forefront of innovation, leveraging cutting-edge technology to drive meaningful impact in the Revenue Cycle Management landscape. Our commitment to excellence is unwavering, and we're seeking a seasoned Principal Azure Cloud Architect to join our dynamic team. As a leading player in the industry, we offer an environment that fosters growth, creativity, and collaboration, where your expertise will be valued and your contributions will make a difference. Position Overview: As a Senior Azure Cloud Architect, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the cloud architecture landscape within our organization. You will be entrusted with the responsibility of guiding Azure Cloud best practices, optimizing cost efficiency through strategic service selection, and acting as a consultant to our entire engineering team. This role requires a blend of technical expertise, strategic vision, and strong communication skills to drive the successful implementation of cloud solutions that align with our business objectives. Key Responsibilities: Cloud Architecture Leadership:  Lead the design and implementation of robust, scalable, and secure Azure cloud architectures that meet business requirements and industry best practices. Cost Optimization : Analyse cloud usage and spending patterns to identify opportunities for cost optimization. Provide recommendations on service selection and resource allocation to maximize cost efficiency without compromising performance or reliability. Technical Consultation:  Serve as a trusted advisor to our engineering teams, providing guidance on cloud architecture design, implementation strategies, and best practices. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with project goals and objectives. Performance Optimization:  Continuously monitor and optimize Azure cloud environments for performance, scalability, and resilience. Implement solutions to address performance bottlenecks and improve overall system efficiency. Security and Compliance:  Ensure that Azure cloud architectures adhere to security and compliance standards, including data encryption, identity and access management, and regulatory requirements. Implement robust security controls to protect sensitive data and mitigate security risks. Documentation and Knowledge Sharing:  Create detailed technical documentation, architecture diagrams, and best practice guidelines to facilitate knowledge sharing and ensure consistency across projects. Conduct training sessions and workshops to educate team members on Azure cloud technologies and best practices. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. Advanced degree or relevant certifications (e.g., Azure Solutions Architect Expert, Azure DevOps Engineer Expert) preferred. Extensive experience designing, implementing, and managing Azure cloud solutions in a senior architect or similar role. In-depth knowledge of Azure cloud services, including compute, storage, networking, and security. Strong understanding of cloud architecture best practices, including scalability, availability, and disaster recovery. Proficiency in infrastructure as code (IaC) tools such as Terraform or ARM templates. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. Proven track record of successfully leading complex cloud architecture projects from inception to completion. Experience in the Revenue Cycle Management domain would be an added advantage.     If you're passionate about cloud technology and eager to make a meaningful impact in a dynamic and collaborative environment, we want to hear from you! Join us at Ensemble Health Partners and be part of a team that's shaping the future of Revenue Cycle Management. Apply now and embark on a rewarding journey of innovation and growth.     Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunities for professional growth and skill development. Collaborative and innovative work culture. Exposure to cutting-edge telephony and contact center technologies. Chance to make a significant impact on the organization's communication infrastructure. Interested folks share the resume on yash.arora@ensemblehp.com
column11: Terraform, Azure Cloud, Cost Optimization, Azure Devops, Azure Cloud Services

column2: Qualification :    BTech/MTech/PhD        As a Design-for-Testability (DFT) Architect, the candidate is expected to have prior experience in defining the DFT Architecture, methodology flow and DFT implementation verification plan.      The candidate also should have DFT end to end execution experience from DFT spec definition to post silicon bringup.      The candidate will meet regularly with other functional team members such as Architects, Verification Engineers, Physical Designers, CAD Engineers, SoC Design Engineers, Product Engineers and Program Management to ensure successful and timely project completion.          PREFERRED EXPERIENCE:          DFT methodology/architecture and DFT verification experience (eg. IEEE1500, JTAG 1149.x, scan, memory BIST, PHY loopback, etc)          Siemens Tessent and/or Cadence Modus.          Experience with VCS simulation tool, Perl/Shell scripting and Verilog RTL design          Prior experience and exposure to DFT timing closure is critical          Pre-Silicon test planning & validation, engagement with design teams          Characterization and debug of Scan/ATPG test in the new silicon designs and process technologies          Optimization of test flows for increased quality and cost improvement          Analysis of part failures leading to test coverage and yield improvement          Analysis of characterization data across PVT          Must have good communication skills and the ability to work in a worldwide team environment          KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:          Work with architecture team and production engineers to understand the product specification, DFT requirements, clock structure, power management and interconnect          Define and drive DFT architecture and implementation plan for the project based on this knowledge          Work with DFT execution team for Implementation and verification of DFT features          Scan/JTAG/Boundary Scan insertion and ATPG pattern generation          Memory BIST logic generation, implementation and verification          SoC level ATPG pattern verification with gate level simulation          Test coverage and test cost reduction analysis          Familiar with DFT timing closure and ECO          Post silicon support and debug to ensure successful bring-up and enhance yield learning          Help scope and analyze new design opportunities          Actively work on DFT methodology and process improvements          Knowledge & experience of low power concepts, clock gating, power gating is a plus

compliance     BCR projects are normally of high complexity, touching every single IT process and IT asset within a Portfolio Company and migrating an entire IT estate into Shell IT     Solution Architect role description:This role requirement is for a Solution Architect who will primarily work with a Portfolio company (eg, RESPC, Downstream Mobility) to understand (and document) their AS-IS (current) Landscape, suggest transition architectures for moving from AS-IS to Shell's standard TO-BE, addressing technical challenge areas and driving joint solutions with Portfolio Company and column2: 1. JOB PURPOSE    Business Context :    Apraava Energy a 50:50 joint venture between CLP group, one of the largest investor -owned power business in Asia and Caisse de dpt et placement du Qubec (CDPQ), one of Canada's leading institutional fund managers. Apraava Energy has a diversified and en vironment -friendly power generation portfolio of ~3000 equity MW comprising both Conventional (~2000 MW) and Renewable (~1200 MW) assets.    Apraava Energy was one of the first companies to identify the potential of renewable energy in India. The company ente red this space by building its first wind farm in 2009. Since then Apraava Energy has gradually grown its wind energy portfolio and is now spread across six states generating nearly 1,000 MW and another 250 MW of committed capacity.     ?Wind energy has been an integral part of Apraava Energy 's business strategy. It is expected to continue making a vital contribution not only to CLP's growth plans for India but also to its commitment towards reducing its CO2 emissions.    Apraava Energy forayed into solar power gen eration with a 100 MW plant in 2016 through a joint venture in Veltoor, Telangana. Apraava Energy acquired two more solar plants in 2018. In 2020, Apraava Energy increased the size of its solar energy portfolio by more than 70% by entering into an agreemen t to acquire three of its solar projects.        In line with Apraava Energy s vision of investing in a low -carbon and clean energy portfolio, Apraava Energy marked its entry into the power transmission sector in 2019 with the acquisition of 240 km transmission l ine. With this, Apraava Energy has broadened its portfolio to straddle two out of the three main segments in Indias power value chain.        The company has also built a 1,320 MW supercritical coal -fired power plant in Jhajjar, Haryana. The Jhajjar Power Plant has been commercially operational since mid -2012. It is one of the first few power plants in India to operationalize the Flue Gas Desulphurization (FGD) unit which helps reduce ~ 85% of SO2 emissions.        The plant has also won the Frost & Sullivan and TERI Ju ry Special Mention Award in 2019 for reducing its specific water consumption to 2.11 m/ MWh against a statutory limit of 3.5 m/ MWh.        The Organization is engaged in Greenfield development of Power Generation/Transmission assets as well as their Acquisit ion. The business objectives in either case can be met only if the asset performs to the business assumptions. Engineering plays a key role in translating that business assumptions into engineering designs which can make sure that business objectives are m et sustainably.        The organization is further diversifying into Power distribution business including Advanced Metering business. This would uniquely position organizations presence across the entire power sector value chain.    Job Purpose :    This position would be Heading IT /OT deployment of AMI projects during implementation and O&M phases. Provide technical support to Site Managers.        2. ORGANI SATIONAL CHART    3. PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES    Accountabilities Major Activities    Heading IT /OT deployment of AMI projects during implementation and O&M phases. Provide technical support to Site Managers.       Responsible for implementation of all IT & OT related activities for successful Go Live of AMI projects .      Development of WFM App, Co nsumer App, Web Portal with System Integrator in line with operational needs.      Review and Finalization of AMI design documents submitted by System Integrator and ensure DISCOM approval.      Responsible for timely availability of IT Infra with required sizing and performance for AMI applications production and successful Go Live.      Day to day monitoring and coordination with System Integrator for resolution of IT related SLA gaps.      Client management activities and conducting state level initiat ives for successful implementation of AMI Project.      Coordination with DISCOM agencies for integration of legacy systems.    4. INTERACTIONS    Internal Clients    Role s you need to interact with inside the organization to enable success in your day to day work Merger & Acquisition Team - Project Hand over Finance Team - DISCOM Invoicing, Cash Collections, Partner Payments Legal Team - Contract Agreements, Contractual Notices, Notice Responses IT Team Quality Manager    External Clients    Role s you need to interact with outside the organization to enable success in your day to day work    3 DISCOM - Project reviews, SLA sign -off, Monthly Payments System Integrator - Project deployment governance Consultants - Cyber Security Audits    5. SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE    Educational Qualifications        Engineering Graduate    Functional Skills        Exposure to Energy Distribution Utilities (AMI / AMR Projects would be added advantage)    Relevant and total years of Experience        8+

column1: MS Dynamics Azure Cloud Solution/Power Platform Solution Architect
column2: To provide functional expertise to HSO s Dynamics 365 customers both nationally and internationally. Reporting to Head of Functional Services             Key Responsibilities           Collaborate with a team of developers and consultants to deliver client engagements.     Project and Delivery Management.     Ensure teams utilization to meet HSOs standards.     Work on D365 projects, collaborate with teams located globally.     Will be required to perform hands - on technical tasks and act as a subject matter expertise.     Work closely with leadership and contribute towards practice development initiative.                 This job description is for a Cloud Solution Architect within the Cloud Application Platform (AP) service line     This is a technical role covering a combination of technical and functional leadership requiring extensive and broad knowledge in one of (a) Power Platform, (b) Azure, or (c) Microsoft 365 technologies, client-facing capability, and (preferably) domain-specific vertical or horizontal experience                 Key Responsibilities    As a Cloud Solution Architect, you will:     Serve as technical leader of Cloud Application Platform adoption, solution development of beautiful and useful things, and otherwise deliver technically excellent Cloud Application Platform engagements to HSO clients.     Be a technical generalist in your area of expertise (e.g. Power Platform, Azure, or Microsoft 365), serving as the technical leader in client-facing engagements; this is in contrast to the Solution Specialist role which focuses on providing deep technical knowledge in specific areas (e.g. Power Apps or Azure Data Services) across many client engagements, but does not generally lead client engagements themselves     Take responsibility for the delivery of technical capabilities to clients at the project level across multiple deliverables, solutions, or workstreams     Serve as the most or one of the most senior technical consultants to one or several clients at any given time, facilitating discovery and delivering in-depth technical expertise with the client or prospect, and leading organizations through Microsoft cloud adoption best practices     Facilitate client-facing consulting services such as cloud assessments, workshops, and co-design sessions     Own the Cloud Adoption Platform (Power Platform, Azure, or Microsoft 365) portion of joint engagements across other HSO service lines (e.g., Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement,     Unified Operations, Data and Analytics, etc.)     Architect solutions across a range of Microsoft cloud technologies including, with assistance, those that are not your core expertise and provide design guidance to Lead, Senior, and other more junior consultants     Provide the project teams with proper guidelines for development standards, execution plans, disaster recovery, performance optimization and integrations     Ensure project team understands the technical architecture of the project and adheres to proper development and execution of the plan (code review, code QA, security review, deployment plan review, integration review)     Ensure a formal process is in place for testing and issues resolution, specifically around the technical architecture and integration points of the implementation     Take responsibility for risk assessment, solution presentation, AS-IS TO BE processes, sizing and topology finalization, defining solution quality, defining technical quality criteria, etc.     Further develop and maintain your own technical expertise, share that expertise with your colleagues as a mentor or producer of best practices and intellectual property, provide technical and thought leadership in chosen technical areas, and create knowledge capital that can be leveraged to accelerate project delivery, improve quality and to secure new engagements     Provide technical pre-sales support to HSO sellers and their clients when needed (e.g. technical presentations to clients, development and presentation of demos, preparation of design and proposal documentation, etc.); note this is not the primary job function, and pre-sales assignments will be made based on technical expertise required by the pursuit       Success Factors    You ll be successful in this role if you have      A strong sense of ownership, autonomy, and personal responsibility for your work     The drive and self-sufficiency to work independently, translate goals into action, own the success of your area of work, support and seek support from colleagues when needed     A passion for Microsoft cloud technologies including Power Platform, Azure, and Microsoft 365     Strong client-facing skills, empathy, and ability to guide clients through challenging problems     5+ years of technical and architecting experience working with Microsoft Cloud and related technologies such as Power Platform and Dynamics 365 CE, Azure, and Microsoft 365     5+ years of experience in consulting or customer settings delivering Power Platform or Dynamics 365 CE, Azure, or Microsoft 365 application, integration, and / or infrastructure solutions     Direct experience designing, building, and delivering Microsoft Dataverse solutions including, but not limited to, forms, workflows, business rules, record security, business process flows      Ability to translate requirements into technical architecture for the solution that is scalable, flexible and complies with industry standards     Experience in customer-facing consulting roles interacting with IT-leaders, product owners, and business users     Experience leading teams of brilliant, passionate, and culturally diverse technologists\     CSAs serve as the technical leader on assigned projects, and may be responsible for managing personnel assigned to those projects (though this will often be the Project Manager s responsibility).      In addition to the duties described in this job description, CSAs may also serve as Pod Leaders wherein they will serve as line managers for other consultants.

column2: Together with GBS Business lines, you advise our customers with your profound technology solution architecture competencies and agile project management and/or consulting experience.         You are responsible for the overall solution design & architecture from the idea to successful go-live of our customer use cases.         You are running technical deep dive and architecture sessions with customers, partners and our devops teams.         You are actively shaping digital use cases by creating & communicating the technical solution architecture in close collaboration with the cross-functional product & customer teams including software engineers, UX designers and business process experts.         You provide architectural guidance for new solutions and services across different technology domains and ensure their compliance with the existing architectural landscape.         You advise customers on architectural decisions considering our digital solutions such as AWS, ServiceNow, Snowflake, Mendix.         You facilitate stakeholder alignment via close collaboration with management levels in HQ and regions.                     You'd describe yourself as:                  You have a successfully completed university degree in Computer Science or other equivalent disciplines and at least 7+ years of experience.         You have deep technical skills in software architecture and cloud computing.         With your customer facing skills, ideally gained within a partner/consulting organization, you inspire your peers for new technologies and processes.         You have a solid understanding on enterprise and cloud integration patterns, integration platform and technologies.         Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment, often with conflicting or changing priorities         High affinity for market-leading technical solutions (eg AWS, ServiceNow, Mendix)         Experience of design and implementation of market-leading technical solutions         Experience and knowledge in technology domains such as advanced analytics, data science, ML/AI, business process management, RPA and low code platforms is of advantage.         You can multitask in a fast-changing environment and bring high-energy, you have analytical thinking and project management ability (Agile delivery, CI/CD, DevOps, IaC).         Experience with Scrum methodology.         Strong verbal and written communications skills in English are a must.         We are looking for a self-motivated person with a deep understanding of cloud, use cases, architectures, workflow and ecosystem.          The ability to connect technology with measurable business value is critical to a Solution Architect.          You should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, products, and technical challenges.         As a Solution Architect, you will engage with Siemens Global Business Services, its customers and prospects across various business lines.          You will be responsible for partnering with process consultants and data analysts to design digital solutions driving digital transformation of our own operations and those of our customers across different technology domains such as advanced analytics, data science / engineering, business process management, low-code, RPA and AI.

Establish the customer supply chain and strengthen the winning position through the Siemens partner network, including global relationships. The position will report Director, Enterprise Architecture and will be based in our Ecolab, Bangalore office.    What you will do:       Set and influence strategic direction for the enterprise platform by translating business needs into solution architecture requirements and understanding the long-term and short-term perspectives of our investments in the finance domain.      Analyze the current architectures in the finance domain to identify weaknesses and develop opportunities for improvement such as enhancing business processes, expanding capacity, reducing time & cost, and increasing overall effectiveness. Acts as an arbitrator, as needed, to bring the appropriate parties together to drive discussions to decisions in a timely manner.          Work closely with stakeholders and business IT leaders to develop architecture blueprints and realistic roadmaps for projects. SAP Financial Supply Chain Management (FSCM) - BCM, TRM      Experienced in On-prem & cloud solutions Implementations With 3rd Party Integration specially like MT940 / Bank Payment Gateway.      Should be able to consult with the finance business teams to build short- and long-term technology strategies.      Review and ensure SAP application architecture in line with industry standard architectural frameworks and are aligned with the overall IT strategy of the organization.      Capability road map of the enterprise portfolio from current to future state.      All Project/Process related Documentation update with FRICEW      Design, implement, and manage finance module with integration solutions.      ( For e.g, Integration with Vistex via middleware)      Develop product roadmaps, execution models, and cost estimates that are aligned with business strategy and guide execution teams in creation, validation, and deployment of global scalable solutions.      Work with technology partners (large and small) to identify the right products and technologies to adopt/ integrate into the overall solution.      Provide solution governance and EA compliance guidance as required.      Ability to work independently and as part of a team. column2: Ensono s Solution Architects are seasoned technologists focused on pushing forward technical innovation and transformation within the solution sets we provide.      They work closely with our clients to understand their business drivers and corporate objectives. Through collaboration with internal technologists, SAs create solutions that drive value for our clients. They also provide client and industry feedback to Ensono s internal teams, which allows us to adjust our product and technology roadmaps.      The Enterprise Solution Architect (ESA) team works alongside and supports the Sales, Consulting and Service Management organizations to service Strategic Enterprise Clients.      They work with the clients business and technical teams to create reference architecture frameworks and templates.      They lead the effort to execute multi-year transformation initiatives in the clients environments.      ESAs also help the account teams identify, pursue and close strategic business development opportunities while driving add-on business within existing accounts.      As part of this, ESAs must be effective in fostering executive level relationships with an emphasis on client satisfaction.      Throughout the engagement process, from discovery to solution implementation, an ESA must work with and often lead multi-disciplinary teams. Ultimately, he/she remains of the owner of the technical design of a client s environment.             Responsibilities         Collaborate with their counterparts in the Sales and Consulting organizations to create Pursuit, Solution, and Sales strategies for existing Enterprise clients     Conduct discovery and assessment workshops (often in collaboration with resources from consulting, operations and product teams) to help drive further penetration of the client account     Develop and document solutions that meet client s (technical and business) requirements and allow them to adapt to changing industry needs with a focus on transformation and re-platform efforts     Conduct solution development sessions and present technical solutions and business cases to a wide variety of audience     Gain executive buy in for complex solutions by engaging in executive and senior-level technology discussions     Gain clients confidence as a trusted advisor by offering consultation and recommendations drawn from insights, technology know-how and past experiences     Service with ongoing requests from solution design perspective     Align and partner with Product Management to help drive appropriate product enhancements and changes to technology roadmap     Aid in driving stability and innovation within the client s current and future state and create solutions based on client requirements and available product offerings             Technical Key Skills (Mandatory Skills)         Experienced communicator at all levels of our client environments from C-level to engineering     Well versed in the hosting technology landscape with 10+ years of overall experience     Previous experience as an SA (Sales Engineer, Solutions Engineer, Solutions Architect) with a hosting service provider preferred     Experienced with large Cloud, IaaS and Datacenter outsourcing solutions     Ability to help create multi-tower outsourcing roadmaps     Comfortable with executive level positioning of complex solutions that span multiple disciplines (hosting, network, security, storage and backup, DR, etc)         Good to have skills         Preferably has experience with (and certified on) hyper-scale cloud platforms (AWS and Azure)

Strong e-commerce functionalities like Product and Catalog Management, Pricing, Promotions, Loyalty, Inventory Management, Order Fulfilment, Warranties, Return management, Payments, Supply Chain, etc.          Experience in B2C implementation and rollouts. Any B2B experience would be an advantage.         Sound knowledge of cloud infrastructure in any of popular platforms like AWS, Azure, GCP. column2: An individual in the Architecture job family is a strategic resource for UnitedHealth Group       This individual could be involved across many aspects of architecture, design, build, engineering and implementation of technical solutions and capabilities providing technical leadership     Responsible for communicating overall architecture vision, technical strategies, and trade-offs across various levels in the organization to gain buy-in     Will provide recommendations and technical guidance to improve performance, reliability, and reusability within the constraints of budget, resource and business dependencies     In base and mid-level roles, engages across teams in a capacity that ranges from assisting on in-flight initiatives, up to technical briefings and demonstrations of new technologies across the organization     In senior level roles, leads business solutions, capabilities, and is a Solid influencer that engages with client executives and stakeholders                   Primary Responsibilities:                 As an Enterprise Architect responsible for IT Strategy formulation and solution delivery in partnership with business leadership, Portfolio Management, Product Management and Engineering teams in the Sales and Marketing product areas             Define and apply the principles that guide technology decisions our business and use them to lead an application modernization and rationalization agenda             Analyze the current technology environment to detect critical deficiencies and collaborate with the Enterprise Architecture from other lines of business and delivery teams to recommend solutions for improvement             Rectify gaps and pain points within the current state by influencing the development, communication and implementation of the enterprise technology architecture             Design and lead the implementation of a Line of Business Technology Architecture (reference architecture) based on business requirements and IT strategies             Build end-to-end solution plans in the form of roadmaps that define the future state solution, scope of solution initiatives, and solution delivery sequencing through architecture transition states             Align capital programs to Enterprise strategy while leveraging existing components and capabilities across the business segment landscape             Lead governance activities to ensure Enterprise Technology Architecture compliance             Communicate the value delivered by the Enterprise Architecture process by communicating outcomes and ongoing results             Create and foster an environment of innovation by removing roadblocks to enable strategic risk taking, advocating and driving change management activities, modeling the adoption of innovative behaviors and practices, and by committing time and energy on the development coaching and performance feedback for each employee on the team             Facilitate change and process improvement within the architecture community             Engage in Industry technology trends and their application to health care as a visible member of the health care technology community             Identify and select the right talent in support of our mission             Reviews the work of others             Develops innovative approaches             Sought out as expert             Serves as a leader/ mentor             Comply with the terms and conditions of the employment contract, company policies and procedures, and any and all directives (such as, but not limited to, transfer and/or re-assignment to different work locations, change in teams and/or work shifts, policies in regards to flexibility of work benefits and/or work environment, alternative work arrangements, and other decisions that may arise due to the changing business environment).              The Company may adopt, vary or rescind these policies and directives in its absolute discretion and without any limitation (implied or otherwise) on its ability to do so                     Required e-commerce, MarTech and/or CRM strategies             5+ years of Prior experience in building digital eCommerce portals using modern technologies such as React, MicroServices, serverless apps, headless content etc             5+ years of experience in the delivery of complex technology solutions that address business issues within a large shared services IT organization             5+ years of experience interfacing with, and influencing decisions of, direct reports to the C-Suite of large organizations             5+ years of experience communicating technology matters to business partners, senior executives, and strategic partners             5+ years of experience working with the business to develop business cases including technology estimates for competing solution alternatives             5+ years of experience creating business-enabling technology roadmaps in aligned closely with business leadership             5+ years of experience introducing new / emerging technology to disrupt business models             3+ years of experience with application modernization and rationalization             3+ years of experience in Agile delivery methods and planning public cloud (Azure, AWS and/or GCP)             Experience working with matrixed and/or global teams to solution and implement technology strategies                                 Preferred Qualifications:                 Certifications in TOGAF, Cloud, or Agile             1+ years of experience in people leadership and management, including direct experience leading, managing and mentoring teams in a virtual / geographically diverse environment

column2: Lead discovery calls with clients to uncover business issues and problems. Define how our product stack can solve business issues and problems      Conduct live demonstrations of our product stack to potential clients focusing on how our solutions solve their business issues and problems      Conduct webinars on industry topics and how they relate to our products and services      Creating sales enablement video content of our products for our Consensus platform      Create technical documentation, tutorials, and training materials to enable the sales team and customers to better understand and utilize our products/services.      Attend industry conferences      Respond to functional requirements within RFPs and RFIs      Work closely with product management to provide feedback from the field and contribute to product roadmap discussions.          Technical          Bachelors degree or above in chemical engineering, pharmaceutical science, chemistry, computer science, information technology      2 + years of industry experience in Quality, Validation, and Quality Risk Management.      Industry knowledge and understanding of the basic regulatory requirements concerning validation, QRM, CPV, and QbD          Understanding of 21 CFR Part 11, CSA, risk analysis, and pharmaceutical manufacturing Proficient with sales enablement tools such as CRM, presales platforms, etc.      Extensive understanding of computer technologies and network infrastructure      Knowledge of cloud computing              Soft Skills          Excellent verbal and written communication skills      Self-motivated and willing to tackle challenges      Ability to cultivate ideas independently and bring a unique perspective to the forefront      Team-oriented collaborator that will partner with sales to strategize and close deals      Excels at presenting complex solutions and simplifying them to end users      Ability to consult with clients as an expert              Nice to have          CSV, Equipment Validation, Instrument Validation, Cleaning Validation, Process Validation, Analytical Method Validation experience      Knowledge of mobile computing platforms (Android, IOS, Windows)      Knowledge of Active Directory and SSO technologies      Experience with databases including MS SQL server, Oracle      Knowledge of Cleaning and Process Validation          Project management experience      Customer Support experience is a plus      Sales experience              We re on a Mission        In 2005, we disrupted the life sciences industry by introducing the world s first digital validation lifecycle management system. ValGenesis VLMS revolutionized compliance-based corporate validation activities and has remained the industry standard.      Today, we continue to push the boundaries of innovation enhancing and expanding our portfolio beyond validation with an end-to-end digital transformation platform. We combine our purpose-built systems with world-class consulting services to help every facet of GxP meet evolving regulations and quality expectations.            The Team You ll Join          Our customers success is our success. We keep the customer experience centered in our decisions, from product to marketing to sales to services to support. Life sciences companies exist to improve humanity s quality of life, and we honor that mission.      We work together. We communicate openly, support each other without reservation, and never hesitate to wear multiple hats to get the job done.      We think big. Innovation is the heart of ValGenesis. That spirit drives product development as well as personal growth. We never stop aiming upward.      We re in it to win it. We re on a path to becoming the number one intelligent validation platform in the market, and we won t settle for anything less than being a market leader.              How We Work        ValGenesis is an equal-opportunity employer that makes employment decisions on the basis of merit. Our goal is to have the best-qualified people in every job. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or any other characteristics protected by local law.

column2: The Dynamic CRM Solution Architect will be responsible for driving Dynamics CRM implementation projects from discovery, definition, build, to test and deploy phases     As the main point of contact for clients throughout all project phases, the Dynamic CRM Solution Architect must effectively manage any associated issues and risks to ensure timely, on-budget, and high-quality implementation delivery that meets clients needs and requirements     This role will involve identifying client sales, marketing, and customer service requirements through discovery meetings, designing and leading the system architecture process in partnership with the Development Team, and creating and defining specifications for customizations for any custom code or data migration requirements using SQL Server Reporting Services         Key Responsibilities         Drive Dynamics CRM implementation projects through all project phases, including discovery, definition, build, test, and deployment Serve as clients main point of contact throughout all project phases, effectively managing associated issues and risks, and ensuring on-time and on-budget implementation delivery that meets clients needs and requirements     Identify the client's sales, marketing, and customer service requirements during discovery meetings     Design and lead the system architecture process, in partnership with the Development Team, to create and define specifications for customizations for any custom code or data migration requirements using SQL Server Reporting Services     Conduct end-user training and create and maintain knowledge transfer documentation     Develop and continue to refine CRM implementation standards and tools     Present tailored demonstrations of the technology solution         Key Requirements         Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related field     5+ years of experience in CRM, ERP, or relevant field     Experience in driving Dynamics CRM implementations or projects through all project phases, including discovery, definition, build, test, and deployment     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills     Ability to influence and motivate others to achieve project objectives     Ability to work in a fast-paced and changing environment     Ability to work independently with minimal supervision     Experience working in a client-facing role     Knowledge of SQL Server Reporting Services         Overall Assessment         The current job description is good, but it could use some improvement     The description provides a clear understanding of the responsibilities and requirements for the role, but it lacks detail in certain areas     For instance, it would be beneficial to include more information on specific skills or certifications required to execute the responsibilities outlined in the description     Additionally, the structure of the job description could be improved by breaking down the responsibilities into sub-headings to make it easier to read and follow

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Solution Architect to lead the design and implementation of The Real Estate CRM. As a Solution Architect, you will collaborate closely with our development team, product managers, and clients to create scalable and efficient solutions that meet business and technical requirements. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, deep understanding of SaaS architecture, and a track record of successful software solution design and delivery.       ?     Responsibility:      Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business and technical requirements, translating them into scalable and reliable software solutions.     Design the overall architecture and technical vision for our platform, ensuring alignment with industry best practices, security standards, and scalability requirements.     Lead the evaluation and selection of appropriate technologies, frameworks, and third-party integrations to support platform development.     Create high-level and detailed technical designs, including system components, interfaces, data models, and integration points. Collaborate with product managers and business analysts to define functional and non-functional requirements, considering usability, performance, and security aspects.     Conduct architecture reviews and code reviews to identify and address potential design and implementation issues.     Identify and mitigate technical risks, proposing alternative solutions when necessary.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of the platform with other systems and services.     Stay updated on emerging technologies, industry trends, and best practices in SaaS and property management domains, applying this knowledge to enhance our platforms capabilities.     Requirements:      Bachelors or masters degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field.     Proven experience as a Solution Architect or similar role in developing and delivering SaaS solutions.     Strong understanding of SaaS architecture principles, including multi-tenancy, scalability, and security.     In-depth knowledge of software development methodologies, frameworks, and languages, including web and cloud technologies (e.g., JavaScript, RESTful APIs, AWS, Azure).     Experience with property management software or real estate industry solutions is highly desirable.     Proficiency in designing and integrating with databases, data modeling, and SQL.     Solid understanding of microservices architecture and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).     Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to balance technical feasibility with business requirements.     Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.     Strong leadership abilities and the capacity to guide and mentor development teams.     Relevant certifications (e.g., AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect) are a plus.
